children.text: You will need to submit a separate PL application for each strength and pharmaceutical form or presentation of the product.
The first section is called 'Tailor your application' and comprises 6 to 10 questions. These questions govern how many other sections of the remaining application form you see.

children.name: selectAppTypeRadio
children.text: What type of application are you making?
Specify the form your medicinal product presented in.

options.title: Only herbal substances in a capsule

children.name: cantSeeMAH
children.text: The MAH is missing or incorrect
If you cannot find the MAH or it's incorrect, you will need to [request this to be added.](/AddNewReferenceData) Once added, you can come back and select it to continue with this section.
MHRA's reference data team will aim to deal with your request within 2 working days.

MHRA's reference data team will aim to deal with your request within 2 working days.

children.name: selectApplyUsingTradingRadioGroup
children.text: Do you want to apply using a trading name for your organisation?
If you cannot find the trading name, you will need to [request this to be added.](/AddNewReferenceData) Once added, you can come back and select it to continue with this section.
MHRA's reference data team will aim to deal with your request within 2 working days.

children.name: licenceApplicationLabel
children.text: What is your PLNI number for your Northern Ireland marketing authorisation?

children.name: TailorYourApplabel
children.text: Please read and confirm the following statements:
The GB application confirms with the dossier approved for marketing in Northern Ireland(NI). Including approved variations.
All iterations of the CHMP/RMS/NI assessment reports and end of procedure documents will be provided with the submission.
The proposed product information is identical to that approved in the NI MA and that the product information, in the Microsoft Word format, will be included with the submission.
The proposed Risk Management Plan(RMP) is identical to the RMP in Northern Ireland and/or the European Union.
Do you confirm the above statements are true?

children.name: licenceApplicationLabel
children.text: What is your PLNI number for your Northern Ireland Registration?
You cannot proceed with this application because it falls under the mandatory scope of community procedures (also known as centralised procedures).

Contact MHRA for further advice on [info@mhra.gov.uk](/).

the licence numbers you have entered are correct
the correct prefix for your licence has been requested, or that you have requested a licence number.
you have [generated a new licence number (opens in new tab)](/).
If you still can't find the licence number, email MHRA customer services at [info@mhra.gov.uk](/).
